title: MIC+NOT+WORKING+PXEL+2+XL WORKS AFTER RESTART FOR 10 MINUTES
content: THE MIC IS NOT WORKING CONSISTENTLY. I GOOGLE, I CAN'T DICTATE TEXTS, I CAN'T TALK ON INCOMING OR OUTGOING CALLS. i CAN'T USE MIC AT ALL. BUT, WHEN I RESTART PHONE IT WILL WORK FOR ABOUT 10 MINUTES THEN STOP. i RESTARTED IN SAFE MODE, BATTERY SAVER OFF, LANGUAGE ENGLISH, PERMISSIONS OK..i'D APPRECIATE HELP. i DON'T THINK i CAN GET HELP IN PERSON ANYWHERE.
